replies.body:
Note: Some I haven't listed, due that I can't remember them ATM. I have listed some of my sisters, though.

iOS: Clash of Clans, Terraria, Hill Climb Racing, Angry Birds, Piano Tiles, Payback, Grabatron, Splashy Fish, Flappy Bird.

PC: TF2, Dota 2, Bloons, Robocraft, Need4Speed: Most Wanted.

PS4, Xbox, Nintendo and Wii: Wii Sports, Fifa, Halo, LEGO games, Disney Infinity, Pokemon, Mario Kart 7 & 8 (Or 6  & 7, Not sure), TMNT!                            So, I think people know I love gaming a lot, eh :P

replies.body: Is Destiny any good? It looks kinda interesting. I have a Ps4, but don't use it as much as i used to :P. I recommend that you guys try the game, infamous second son. It is a whole lot of single player fun. Despite it not having an online system, it is actually pretty entertaining! Oh and another game, Lego Marvel super heroes may sound lame to some, but in fact it is a really fun experience! It has all your favorite marvel super heroes and villains as lego mini figures! My favorite character to use is usually Hulk, for super heroes, and Magneto for villians.
replies.body_tagged: Is Destiny any good? It looks kinda interesting. I have a Ps4, but don't use it as much as i used to :P. I recommend that you guys try the game, infamous second son. It is a whole lot of single player fun. Despite it not having an online system, it is actually pretty entertaining! Oh and another game, Lego Marvel super heroes may sound lame to some, but in fact it is a really fun experience! It has all your favorite marvel super heroes and villains as lego mini figures! My favorite character to use is usually Hulk, for super heroes, and Magneto for villians.
